name: OR_LNLG_POSITION
description: This table contains the Patient Positioning information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: HEAD_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The head position of the patient.

columns.name: RT_ARM_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The right arm position of the patient.

columns.name: LEFT_ARM_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The left arm position of the patient.

columns.name: RT_LEG_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The right leg position of the patient.

columns.name: LEFT_LEG_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The left leg position of the patient.

columns.name: POS_PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure ID of the current position.

columns.name: POS_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: POSITION_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the patient was positioned.

columns.name: PANEL_NUM_POSITION
columns.description: Panel number to which positioning data applies
